item.title: why Testing ox-hugo
item.description: Let’s try some tags where do they go? tags are ignored here, they are properties. is auto-save working? An image %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.plot([1, 2, 4, 8]); def func(x): return 2 * x func(3) 6 (message "This is line 1") (message "This is line 2") (message "This is line 3") CH4is fire. bold and code is not like verbatim. changed my mind. one two three is this all in memory?
